name: Deep Motion (LeapMotion)
description:
NOTE: This game requires a Leap Motion device to play.

A game in which you use your real hands to navigate a ship and rescue small ships stranded in a flooded Hamburg.

Alternate controls (in case you have problems with your Leap Motion)

Move: WASD

Skip Events: E

Restart: R

An experimental game by

Annabell Koenen-Rindfrey

Leon Arndt

Let us know what you think in the comments. We hope you enjoy the experience!
